00116 int
00117 Cudd_addRead(
00118   FILE * fp /* input file pointer */,
00119   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00120   DdNode ** E /* characteristic function of the graph */,
00121   DdNode *** x /* array of row variables */,
00122   DdNode *** y /* array of column variables */,
00123   DdNode *** xn /* array of complemented row variables */,
00124   DdNode *** yn_ /* array of complemented column variables */,
00125   int * nx /* number or row variables */,
00126   int * ny /* number or column variables */,
00127   int * m /* number of rows */,
00128   int * n /* number of columns */,
00129   int  bx /* first index of row variables */,
00130   int  sx /* step of row variables */,
00131   int  by /* first index of column variables */,
00132   int  sy /* step of column variables */)
00133 {
00134     DdNode *one, *zero;
00135     DdNode *w, *neW;
00136     DdNode *minterm1;
00137     int u, v, err, i, nv;
00138     int lnx, lny;
00139     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE val;
00140     DdNode **lx, **ly, **lxn, **lyn;
00141 
00142     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00143     zero = DD_ZERO(dd);
00144 
00145     err = fscanf(fp, "%d %d", &u, &v);
00146     if (err == EOF) {
00147         return(0);
00148     } else if (err != 2) {
00149         return(0);
00150     }
00151 
00152     *m = u;
00153     /* Compute the number of x variables. */
00154     lx = *x; lxn = *xn;
00155     u--;        /* row and column numbers start from 0 */
00156     for (lnx=0; u > 0; lnx++) {
00157         u >>= 1;
00158     }
00159     /* Here we rely on the fact that REALLOC of a null pointer is
00160     ** translates to an ALLOC.
00161     */
00162     if (lnx > *nx) {
00163         *x = lx = REALLOC(DdNode *, *x, lnx);
00164         if (lx == NULL) {
00165             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00166             return(0);
00167         }
00168         *xn = lxn =  REALLOC(DdNode *, *xn, lnx);
00169         if (lxn == NULL) {
00170             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00171             return(0);
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     *n = v;
00176     /* Compute the number of y variables. */
00177     ly = *y; lyn = *yn_;
00178     v--;        /* row and column numbers start from 0 */
00179     for (lny=0; v > 0; lny++) {
00180         v >>= 1;
00181     }
00182     /* Here we rely on the fact that REALLOC of a null pointer is
00183     ** translates to an ALLOC.
00184     */
00185     if (lny > *ny) {
00186         *y = ly = REALLOC(DdNode *, *y, lny);
00187         if (ly == NULL) {
00188             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00189             return(0);
00190         }
00191         *yn_ = lyn =  REALLOC(DdNode *, *yn_, lny);
00192         if (lyn == NULL) {
00193             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00194             return(0);
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     /* Create all new variables. */
00199     for (i = *nx, nv = bx + (*nx) * sx; i < lnx; i++, nv += sx) {
00200         do {
00201             dd->reordered = 0;
00202             lx[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, one, zero);
00203         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00204         if (lx[i] == NULL) return(0);
00205         cuddRef(lx[i]);
00206         do {
00207             dd->reordered = 0;
00208             lxn[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, zero, one);
00209         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00210         if (lxn[i] == NULL) return(0);
00211         cuddRef(lxn[i]);
00212     }
00213     for (i = *ny, nv = by + (*ny) * sy; i < lny; i++, nv += sy) {
00214         do {
00215             dd->reordered = 0;
00216             ly[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, one, zero);
00217         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00218         if (ly[i] == NULL) return(0);
00219         cuddRef(ly[i]);
00220         do {
00221             dd->reordered = 0;
00222             lyn[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, zero, one);
00223         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00224         if (lyn[i] == NULL) return(0);
00225         cuddRef(lyn[i]);
00226     }
00227     *nx = lnx;
00228     *ny = lny;
00229 
00230     *E = dd->background; /* this call will never cause reordering */
00231     cuddRef(*E);
00232 
00233     while (! feof(fp)) {
00234         err = fscanf(fp, "%d %d %lf", &u, &v, &val);
00235         if (err == EOF) {
00236             break;
00237         } else if (err != 3) {
00238             return(0);
00239         } else if (u >= *m || v >= *n || u < 0 || v < 0) {
00240             return(0);
00241         }
00242  
00243         minterm1 = one; cuddRef(minterm1);
00244 
00245         /* Build minterm1 corresponding to this arc */
00246         for (i = lnx - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00247             if (u & 1) {
00248                 w = Cudd_addApply(dd, Cudd_addTimes, minterm1, lx[i]);
00249             } else {
00250                 w = Cudd_addApply(dd, Cudd_addTimes, minterm1, lxn[i]);
00251             }
00252             if (w == NULL) {
00253                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00254                 return(0);
00255             }
00256             cuddRef(w);
00257             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00258             minterm1 = w;
00259             u >>= 1;
00260         }
00261         for (i = lny - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00262             if (v & 1) {
00263                 w = Cudd_addApply(dd, Cudd_addTimes, minterm1, ly[i]);
00264             } else {
00265                 w = Cudd_addApply(dd, Cudd_addTimes, minterm1, lyn[i]);
00266             }
00267             if (w == NULL) {
00268                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00269                 return(0);
00270             }
00271             cuddRef(w);
00272             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00273             minterm1 = w;
00274             v >>= 1;
00275         }
00276         /* Create new constant node if necessary.
00277         ** This call will never cause reordering.
00278         */
00279         neW = cuddUniqueConst(dd, val);
00280         if (neW == NULL) {
00281             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00282             return(0);
00283         }
00284         cuddRef(neW);
00285 
00286         w = Cudd_addIte(dd, minterm1, neW, *E);
00287         if (w == NULL) {
00288             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00289             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, neW);
00290             return(0);
00291         }
00292         cuddRef(w);
00293         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00294         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, neW);
00295         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, *E);
00296         *E = w;
00297     }
00298     return(1);
00299 
00300 } /* end of Cudd_addRead */

00339 int
00340 Cudd_bddRead(
00341   FILE * fp /* input file pointer */,
00342   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00343   DdNode ** E /* characteristic function of the graph */,
00344   DdNode *** x /* array of row variables */,
00345   DdNode *** y /* array of column variables */,
00346   int * nx /* number or row variables */,
00347   int * ny /* number or column variables */,
00348   int * m /* number of rows */,
00349   int * n /* number of columns */,
00350   int  bx /* first index of row variables */,
00351   int  sx /* step of row variables */,
00352   int  by /* first index of column variables */,
00353   int  sy /* step of column variables */)
00354 {
00355     DdNode *one, *zero;
00356     DdNode *w;
00357     DdNode *minterm1;
00358     int u, v, err, i, nv;
00359     int lnx, lny;
00360     DdNode **lx, **ly;
00361 
00362     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00363     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00364 
00365     err = fscanf(fp, "%d %d", &u, &v);
00366     if (err == EOF) {
00367         return(0);
00368     } else if (err != 2) {
00369         return(0);
00370     }
00371 
00372     *m = u;
00373     /* Compute the number of x variables. */
00374     lx = *x;
00375     u--;        /* row and column numbers start from 0 */
00376     for (lnx=0; u > 0; lnx++) {
00377         u >>= 1;
00378     }
00379     if (lnx > *nx) {
00380         *x = lx = REALLOC(DdNode *, *x, lnx);
00381         if (lx == NULL) {
00382             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00383             return(0);
00384         }
00385     }
00386 
00387     *n = v;
00388     /* Compute the number of y variables. */
00389     ly = *y;
00390     v--;        /* row and column numbers start from 0 */
00391     for (lny=0; v > 0; lny++) {
00392         v >>= 1;
00393     }
00394     if (lny > *ny) {
00395         *y = ly = REALLOC(DdNode *, *y, lny);
00396         if (ly == NULL) {
00397             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00398             return(0);
00399         }
00400     }
00401 
00402     /* Create all new variables. */
00403     for (i = *nx, nv = bx + (*nx) * sx; i < lnx; i++, nv += sx) {
00404         do {
00405             dd->reordered = 0;
00406             lx[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, one, zero);
00407         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00408         if (lx[i] == NULL) return(0);
00409         cuddRef(lx[i]);
00410     }
00411     for (i = *ny, nv = by + (*ny) * sy; i < lny; i++, nv += sy) {
00412         do {
00413             dd->reordered = 0;
00414             ly[i] = cuddUniqueInter(dd, nv, one, zero);
00415         } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00416         if (ly[i] == NULL) return(0);
00417         cuddRef(ly[i]);
00418     }
00419     *nx = lnx;
00420     *ny = lny;
00421 
00422     *E = zero; /* this call will never cause reordering */
00423     cuddRef(*E);
00424 
00425     while (! feof(fp)) {
00426         err = fscanf(fp, "%d %d", &u, &v);
00427         if (err == EOF) {
00428             break;
00429         } else if (err != 2) {
00430             return(0);
00431         } else if (u >= *m || v >= *n || u < 0 || v < 0) {
00432             return(0);
00433         }
00434  
00435         minterm1 = one; cuddRef(minterm1);
00436 
00437         /* Build minterm1 corresponding to this arc. */
00438         for (i = lnx - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00439             if (u & 1) {
00440                 w = Cudd_bddAnd(dd, minterm1, lx[i]);
00441             } else {
00442                 w = Cudd_bddAnd(dd, minterm1, Cudd_Not(lx[i]));
00443             }
00444             if (w == NULL) {
00445                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00446                 return(0);
00447             }
00448             cuddRef(w);
00449             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,minterm1);
00450             minterm1 = w;
00451             u >>= 1;
00452         }
00453         for (i = lny - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00454             if (v & 1) {
00455                 w = Cudd_bddAnd(dd, minterm1, ly[i]);
00456             } else {
00457                 w = Cudd_bddAnd(dd, minterm1, Cudd_Not(ly[i]));
00458             }
00459             if (w == NULL) {
00460                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00461                 return(0);
00462             }
00463             cuddRef(w);
00464             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00465             minterm1 = w;
00466             v >>= 1;
00467         }
00468 
00469         w = Cudd_bddAnd(dd, Cudd_Not(minterm1), Cudd_Not(*E));
00470         if (w == NULL) {
00471             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00472             return(0);
00473         }
00474         w = Cudd_Not(w);
00475         cuddRef(w);
00476         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minterm1);
00477         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, *E);
00478         *E = w;
00479     }
00480     return(1);
00481 
00482 } /* end of Cudd_bddRead */
